mapper.insert: insert into job_tasks_table( job_task_id, source_table_name, target_table_name, ignore_target_case, force_matched, direct_map_table ) values ( #{jobTaskId}, #{sourceTableName}, #{targetTableName}, #{ignoreTargetCase}, #{forceMatched}, #{directMapTable} )

insert into job_tasks_table( job_task_id, source_table_name, target_table_name, ignore_target_case, force_matched, direct_map_table ) VALUE
( #{tables.jobTaskId}, #{tables.sourceTableName}, #{tables.targetTableName}, #{tables.ignoreTargetCase}, #{tables.forceMatched}, #{tables.directMapTable} )
mapper.update: update job_tasks_table set job_task_id = #{jobTasksTable.jobTaskId}, source_table_name = #{jobTasksTable.sourceTableName}, target_table_name = #{jobTasksTable.targetTableName}, ignore_target_case = #{jobTasksTable.ignoreTargetCase}, force_matched = #{jobTasksTable.forceMatched}, direct_map_table = #{jobTasksTable.directMapTable} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select id, job_task_id AS jobTaskId, source_table_name AS sourceTableName, target_table_name AS targetTableName, ignore_target_case as ignoreTargetCase, force_matched as forceMatched, direct_map_table as directMapTable from job_tasks_table WHERE job_task_id = #{jobTaskId}

select id, job_task_id AS jobTaskId, source_table_name AS sourceTableName, target_table_name AS targetTableName, ignore_target_case as ignoreTargetCase, force_matched as forceMatched, direct_map_table as directMapTable from job_tasks_table where 1=1 limit #{page.offset},#{page.pageSize}

update job_tasks_table

where id = #{id}
